hero.name: Wei Xie
hero.title: Fullstack Engineer
hero.positioning: Designing modular enterprise platforms and scalable SaaS systems. Focused on modern frontend architecture with Vue 3 and TypeScript, paired with robust backend services in ASP.NET Core.

about.title: About
about.text:
I am a Fullstack Engineer with over 10 years of experience building and evolving enterprise SaaS platforms.

My work centers on modernizing legacy systems, improving architectural boundaries, and designing scalable frontend and backend solutions. I focus on creating modular structures that remain maintainable as systems grow in complexity.

I value clean architecture, pragmatic engineering decisions, and long-term system sustainability.

frontend.title: Frontend Architecture
frontend.description:
Designing scalable component ecosystems and modular frontend structures for enterprise applications.

Technologies: Vue 3 · Nuxt.js · TypeScript · Micro Frontends · Vuetify

backend.title: Backend Systems
backend.description:
Building REST-based services and modular backend architectures using ASP.NET Core and C#.

Technologies: ASP.NET Core · C# · REST APIs · LoopBack · Laravel · SQL Server

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & Platforms
ecommerce.description:
Architecting and scaling transactional platforms with high availability requirements.

Technologies: Magento · AWS · Redis · Microservices

devops.title: DevOps & CI/CD
devops.description:

solendroPlatform.title: Solendro Platform Evolution
solendroPlatform.tech: Nuxt.js · LoopBack · Magento · AWS OpsWorks · Laravel
solendroPlatform.summary1: Led the architectural evolution of an international e-commerce platform, transitioning from a legacy Magento system to a modern API-driven architecture using Nuxt.js and LoopBack.
solendroPlatform.summary2: Progressively decoupled business logic and improved deployment workflows to increase maintainability and scalability.
solendroPlatform.impact: Modernized platform architecture and supported international expansion (Spain & UK).

dataAnalytics.title: Data & Analytics Platform
dataAnalytics.summary1: Designed and implemented an internal analytics system to centralize operational and business reporting across multiple workflows.
dataAnalytics.summary2: Built custom dashboards and data aggregation pipelines to improve system visibility and decision-making.
dataAnalytics.impact: Increased operational transparency and data-driven insights.

enterpriseCrm.title: Enterprise CRM Modernization
enterpriseCrm.tech: Vue 3 · TypeScript · ASP.NET Core · REST APIs
enterpriseCrm.summary1: Contributing to the modernization of a multi-tenant enterprise CRM platform by refactoring legacy components and improving architectural boundaries.
enterpriseCrm.summary2: Introduced modular frontend structures and strengthened service integration through REST-based backend systems.
enterpriseCrm.impact: Improved maintainability, scalability, and architectural clarity.

microFrontends.title: Micro Frontend Architecture Design
microFrontends.summary1: Designed modular frontend architecture to enable scalable development across teams and products.
microFrontends.summary2: Established shared component systems and clear domain boundaries to reduce coupling and improve long-term codebase sustainability.
microFrontends.impact: Enhanced cross-team development efficiency and frontend scalability.

eudonet.description: Contributing to enterprise CRM modernization and internal platform evolution.
